response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features and high-quality materials used. Given its worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to you. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special offer price of $12,000. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while also providing you with a significant saving. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 12000}
